summary:
- Designed and developed export/import functionality for OCI Data Integration Service to facilitate reuse of DIS artifacts 
 - Developed templates feature for OCI Data Integration service to allow users to create DI applications from pre-defined templates 
 - Involved in service improvements and support for DIS

- Worked on integrating o365 telemetry data with Cisco’s SDWAN data to optimize data path selection 
 - Worked on writing various correlations for vAnalytics (Cisco’s SDWAN Analytics Engine)
 - Optimized ETL processing for vAnalytics leading to 40% reduction in processing time 
 - Worked on developing simulator for vManage scale testing

- Worked on developing/maintaining features for IBM Content Classification (ICC)
 - Developed functionality to get data from IBM Datacap and classify using ICC
 - Actively involved in creation of Knowledge Base and Decision Plan for ICC clients
